title: Poster, Exhibition Poster: Carl Andre,  Galerie Heiner Friedrich, Munich, 1968
title_raw: Exhibition Poster: Carl Andre,  Galerie Heiner Friedrich, Munich
inscribed: Imprinted in black, top edge: "CARL ANDRE ERÖFFNUNG 26.3.68  19 UHR 26.3.-18.4. DI.-SA. 10-19 UHR". Imprinted in black, lower edge: "GALERIE HEINERFRIEDRICH MÜNCHENMAXILIAN STR. 15 TEL. 295021".
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Art exhibition poster with German text along top and bottom; accross center, horizontal,  row of small black rectangles going straight across from left edge to right edge.  The central image recalls the artist's minimalist sculpture installation Lever (1966), a single straight line of 139 unjoined fire bricks arranged across the middle of the floor of a room.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, Exhibition Poster: Carl Andre,  Galerie Heiner Friedrich, Munich, 1968. Offset lithograph. 
Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1999-45-5.
